translations: 减缓（abate 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: As the crisis abates, things will improve.
sentences.translation: 危机消除时，情形会有所改善。

sentences.sentence: It will be focusing on preserving cash levels until the crisis abates.
sentences.translation: 国泰航空将集中精力保持现金水平直至危机解除。

sentences.sentence: It is also too small: it abates only 330m tonnes of CO2 per year, and billions of tonnes must be cut.
sentences.translation: 有关项目规模也太小，每年仅能削减3.3亿吨二氧化碳排放，而须削减的数量达数十亿吨。
